## Questions

# 1

The code chunk given throws an error because the package "tidyverse" is not being called. In order to use the select () function, the code chunk must include "library (tidyverse)" before the "mtcars |> select (mpg, cyl)"

# 3

Given: 
```{r}
obj1 <- 2:10
obj2 <- c(2, 5)
obj3 <- c(TRUE, FALSE)
obj4 <- 42
```

Questions and Answers:

```{r}
obj1 * 10
obj1[2:4]
obj1[-3]
obj1 + obj2
obj1 * obj3
obj1 + obj4
obj2 + obj3
sum(obj2)
sum(obj3)
```
